name: Gift for GF
description:
This is a game made for GameDevNetwork: The Big Festive Game Jam - Theme: Surprise

Gameplay - Arrows to move and up arrow to jump.

Short game made with construct.. surprise ur gf with one gift.

I joined this gamejam but had to make a trip a few days before starting and now I have to travel again, so I didnt have much time to work in this game. I get some free assets and created some just to finish the game on time and be able to participate, I hope you have fun playing ..  :)

Created by:

Renato Mad

Felipe Aguiar
